import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import weddingImage from '../styles/images/brave2.jpeg'; import weddingMusic from '../styles/music.mp3'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contentt = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const audioRef = useRef(null); // Referensi ke elemen audio const [audioPlayed, setAudioPlayed] = useState(false); const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false); function playAudio() { if (!audioPlayed) { audioRef.current.play(); setAudioPlayed(true); setIsPlaying(true); } else { if (isPlaying) { audioRef.current.pause(); } else { audioRef.current.play(); } setIsPlaying(!isPlaying); } } // const [audioPlayed, setAudioPlayed] = useState(false); // function playAudio() { // const audio = new Audio(weddingMusic); // audio.play(); // setAudioPlayed(true); // } // --------------------------------------------------- // const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(true); // const handleToggleAudio = () => { // toggleAudio(); // setIsPlaying((prevIsPlaying) => !prevIsPlaying); // } return (

Contentt

{/* */} {audioPlayed && (

{isPlaying ? 'Audio sedang diputar...' : 'Audio dijeda'}

)}
